#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Texas student Ahmed Mohamed inspires social movement
#Text=Tuesday , September 22 , 2015
#Text=News of police response to a boy 's digital clock in Texas last week has inspired a global social movement in support of the youth .
#Text=Ahmed Mohamed , a 14 - year - old boy from Irving , Texas , was arrested at his school by police after he brought a digital clock he had made to school .
#Text=After news of the police response was reported , Mohamed received support online ranging from US President Barack Obama to Facebook creator Mark Zuckerberg .

#Text=Yesterday Mohamed received VIP attention at Google headquarters in California at the Google Science Fair — and tomorrow he plans to meet international dignitaries at the United Nations headquarters in New York .
#Text=US President Barack Obama tweet to student Ahmed Mohamed
#Text=Image : Twitter / Barack Obama .
#Text=Mohamed brought the digital clock he made to school on September 14 , and a teacher mistakenly thought it resembled a bomb .
#Text=Police arrested and questioned the student .
#Text=Images of the boy wearing a NASA T - shirt and handcuffed by the police were quickly posted and reposted online .
#Text=The Deseret News observed that the hashtag on Twitter , #IStandWithAhmed , had become an international phenomenon .
#Text=The Straits Times noted what began as individual messages to Mohamed had grown into a " support movement " .

column1: #Text=American academic and professor Marc Lamont Hill commented ,
#Text=" Hoping that the #istandwithahmed movement translates into a substantive national conversation on race , punishment , and incarceration . "
#Text=The Twitter attention led to outreach from Google and Mohamed was invited to their Google Science Fair .
#Text=Mohamed was a VIP guest at the Google Science Fair this weekend , and was able to meet finalists at the event held at Google 's headquarters located in Mountain View , California .
#Text=Co-founder of Google , Sergey Brin , personally met with Mohamed during his visit to Google .
#Text=On Wednesday , Mohamed and his father are to travel to the United Nations .

#Text=His father Mohamed El - Hassan Mohamed said he was taking his entire family to the U.N. headquarters in New York , because international dignitaries wanted to meet with his son and express their support .
#Text=Psychology major at University of Texas Arlington Amneh Jafari heard of the incident and wanted to issue her support to Mohamed .
#Text=She chose the hastag #IStandWithAhmed and posted to Twitter .
#Text=Jafari said she felt Mohamed had been subject to Islamophobia and her hashtag created greater awareness about this issue .
#Text=The hashtag took on a life of its own , and was used in messages on Twitter over one million times by Thursday night .
#Text=NASA tweeted support of Ahmed Mohamed via its account International Space Station
#Text=Image : Twitter / NASA .
#Text=US President Barack Obama tweeted using his @POTUS account :
#Text=" Cool clock , Ahmed .
